interactivity.to_get_this_event: Autoplays after " Into the Woods " , or " Out of the Woods " . This event belongs to an event chain started from " Good Morning " .
effects: +1 Ami , Ayane , Chika , Futaba , Makoto , Maya , Miku , Rin , Sana , Yumi Affection
+1 Io , Kirin , Molly , Nodoka , Noriko , Otoha , Touka , Tsuneyo , Uta , Yasu Affection

locations: Beach - First Floor's Room/Second Floor's Room
progression.synopsis: Sensei will spend the night with whichever set of girls won the dorm war , and goes around talking to them. If the First Floor won the Dorm War: If the Second Floor won the Dorm War:
trivia: The scene is completely different based on Dorm War results. Additionally, there can be slight variations depending on a lot of past choices. On the Floor 1 route, there is variation in the dialogue depending on the following: If Sensei saw Into the Woods . If Sensei saw Prisoner . Sensei's choice during No One Can See Us . On the Floor 2 route, there is variation in the dialogue depending on the following: If Sensei saw Taking the Reins . If Sensei saw The Princess & The Pauper .
